item.title: Automating Hugo Site Deployment with GitHub Actions and Private Repositories
item.description: I’ve always been a proponent of DevOps, and my recent experiments with Hugo have led me to automate the deployment of my site. This post details how I set up an automatic deployment process for my Hugo site using GitHub Actions while keeping my drafts and content private until I’m ready to share them. Keeping a Private Repository for Hugo Site Definition I have a private repository for my Hugo site definition to keep my draft posts and other content secure until they’re ready for the public.
